analysis.description:
Burner.burn (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#710-745) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- erc20ToBurn = kyberContract.trade.value(ethToConvert)(ERC20(0x00eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee),ethToConvert,ERC20(destErc20),this,maxDestAmount,minConversionRate,0) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#743-745)

KyberNetwork.listPairForReserve (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#380-401) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-src.approve(reserve,2 ** 255) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#392-393)
	-src.approve(reserve,0) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#394)

KyberNetwork.doReserveTrade (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#600-624) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-src.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,amount) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#613)

KyberNetwork.findBestRate has external calls inside a loop:
	- rates[i] = reserves[i].getConversionRate(src,dest,srcQty,block.number) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#477-478)

Reentrancy in KyberNetwork.listPairForReserve (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#380-401):
	External calls:
	- src.approve(reserve,2 ** 255) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#392-393)
	- src.approve(reserve,0) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#394)
	- setDecimals(src) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#397-399)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- decimals (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#397-399)

Reentrancy in KyberNetwork.listPairForReserve (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#380-401):
	External calls:
	- src.approve(reserve,2 ** 255) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#392-393)
	- src.approve(reserve,0) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#394)
	- setDecimals(src) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#397-399)
	- setDecimals(dest) (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#399)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- decimals (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#399)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#500-501:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/13/0xfcb4393e7faef06fab01c00d67c1895545aff3b8.sol#1): it allows old versions
